description: Whatever winter hiking looks like for you, warmth, comfort, protection, and traction are non-negotiable “must-haves.” So we built an insulated, waterproof, grippy hiker that checks all the boxes. All hike. No compromises.
name: Keen Circadia Mid Polar - Mens

specs.value: Thermal Heat Shield insole captures warmth
200g of KEEN.WARM insulation rated to -25°F and a KEEN.DRY waterproof, breathable membrane keep your feet toasty and dry
Environmentally preferred leather upper is lighter on the planet
KEEN LuftCore technology embeds a lightweight foam core inside the midsole to absorb shock for comfort that lasts all day
